alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tishomingo and northeastern Prentiss Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burnsville, or near Iuka, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Iuka, Burnsville, Midway, Paden, Bacon Springs, Oldham, Blythe Crossing, Carter Branch, Hazard Switch, Walker Siding, Mingo, Holcut, Holts Spur and Petertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
